Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『食材置き場』 年中涼しいスールズでは、 半地下に食材置き場を作るのが 一般的。ひんやりしている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>"Pantry" In Sulz, where it's cold all year round, it's common to build a food storage area in the semi-basement.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『スールズ式ストーブ』 室内の暖房だけではなく、 調理用の加熱器にもなる優れもの。 室内を乾燥させないように お湯を沸かすのも生活の知恵。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>"Sulz-type Stove" It is not only used for heating the house, but also excellent for cooking. It is also common knowledge to boil water on top to keep the indoors from drying out.

Entry.JapaneseText: サム
誰？ どこから来た人？ <Veigue>のお友達？
Entry.EnglishText: Who are you? Where are you from? Are you <Veigue>'s friends?

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり人を 凍らせちゃうの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it true that he freezes people?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>!! 僕、何も悪い事してないよ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>!! I didn't do anything wrong, I promise!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、凍らせないで？
Entry.EnglishText: So please don't freeze me, okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアちゃん、かわいそう……
Entry.EnglishText: Poor Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアちゃん、助けにいくの？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you going to rescue Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: え、お父さん？ 知らないよ？ さっきまで家の前で働いてたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, my dad? You don't know? He was just working in front of the house til just now...

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんに、トムくんとは 遊ぶなって言われちゃった…… どうして？
Entry.EnglishText: My father told me I couldn't play with Tom... Why's that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、うちの父ちゃん、 窓の外を見てため息ばかり…… ……どうして？
Entry.EnglishText: Lately, my dad's been looking out the window and sighing... Why's that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 村のみんなで ピーチパイを……？
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone in the village is going to eat peach pie?

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、トムくんも 来るかな？
Entry.EnglishText: So, is Tom going too?

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ろうどうは、とおとい」！
……らしいよ。 父ちゃんと母ちゃんの 受け売りだけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I think. I'm just repeating what my Mom and Dad tell me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 母ちゃんに言われて、 窓拭きしてたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I told my mom that I was cleaning the windows...

Entry.JapaneseText: 疲れちゃったから、 休憩中……
Entry.EnglishText: But I'm tired, so I'm taking a break...

Entry.JapaneseText: サムの母親
クレアちゃん、かわいそうにね……
Entry.EnglishText: Poor Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: どなたさん？ この辺りでは 見ない顔だけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Who are you? I haven't seen your face around here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、悪いけど あんたが来ると うちの子供が怖がるの、 凍らされるって。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry <Veigue>, but my child gets scared when you come over. He thinks that you'll freeze him.

Entry.JapaneseText: そりゃ、あんたが助けに 行くのがスジってもんよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You need to save Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの子を氷に閉じ込めた 償いをちゃんとしなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: You need to atone for trapping her in ice.

Entry.JapaneseText: 忙しい、忙しい……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm busy, busy...

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、うちの旦那？ さあ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, my husband? Well...

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人が急に、ヒューマの ために働くのはイヤだって 言い出したの。
Entry.EnglishText: He said that he didn't want to do work for any Humas anymore.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Why is that?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも私も前から 不満はあったのよね…… いえ、こっちの話……
Entry.EnglishText: But I also have my own complaints... I'll stop there...

Entry.JapaneseText: 旦那が働かなくても 私は家族のために働くの。
Entry.EnglishText: Since my husband hasn't been working I've been having to work to support this family.

Entry.JapaneseText: それが主婦の務めですもの。
あーあ、忙しい、忙しい……
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh, I'm busy, busy...

Entry.JapaneseText: あら、ポプラおばさんの ピーチパイを？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, Ms. Poplar's peach pies?

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、私も何かお料理を 持って行こうかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if I should bring some food as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これは 忙しくなるわね……
Entry.EnglishText: ...That'll make me busy too...

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきの地鳴りで 野菜類が崩れちゃったの。
なんとか片付けたけど…… もうないわよね……？ あんな地鳴り。
Entry.EnglishText: I've managed to tidy them up but...it's gone right? The earthquake that is.

Entry.JapaneseText: 忙しい、忙しい……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm busy, busy...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……！ あれはどこに やったかしらね……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah...! Where did I put it...

Entry.JapaneseText: サムの父親
Entry.EnglishText: Sam's Father

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか行きづらいなぁ…… どうしようかな……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want to go... What should I do...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっとヒドイ事言いすぎたよな…… 本当に許してくれるかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: I've said some terrible stuff... Do you think they'll forgive me...

Entry.JapaneseText: はあ……俺…… どうしてヒューマの事、 ひどく言ったりしたんだろ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh...why was I saying such terrible things about Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: あーあ…… みんなと顔合わせづらいよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh...I don't want to show my face to anyone...

Entry.JapaneseText: そりゃ、みんなと仲良く パイは食べたいけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I do like the idea of eating pie together with everyone again, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺、ヒューマたちに ヒドイ事言っちゃったもんな……
Entry.EnglishText: I said some pretty terrible things to the Huma..

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ケンカしてもすぐ仲直りできた。 それはオレたちが長年、ともに 同じ村で暮らしてきた仲間だからだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We've fought before, but it never took long to smooth things over. We've all been a part of the same village for so long, after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 今だって、それは 変わらないんじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why should things be any different now?

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……そうかな…… そうだといいんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes...you're not wrong, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 行って……みようかな……
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose...I could at least try.

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3404>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3404> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><font:80000002><Unk19:3410>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:0140><speed:00><Unk19:3410> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice
